org.brickred.socialauth
Class AuthProviderFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.brickred.socialauth.AuthProviderFactory

public class AuthProviderFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This is a factory which creates an instance of the requested provider based on the string passed as id. Currently available providers are facebook, foursquare, google, hotmail, linkedin,myspace, openid, twitter, yahoo . If requested provider id is not matched, it returns the OpenId provider.

Author:
tarunn@brickred.com

Method Detail

getInstance

public static AuthProvider getInstance(java.lang.String id)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
It provides the instance of requested provider

Parameters:
id - the id of requested provider. It can be facebook, foursquare, google, hotmail, linkedin,myspace, twitter, yahoo
Returns:
AuthProvider the instance of requested provider based on given id. If id is a URL it returns the OpenId provider.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
